statements: DELETE FROM academic_deadlines WHERE event_name = 'Final Exam';
DELETE FROM academic_deadlines WHERE id = 1 AND deadline_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM academic_deadlines WHERE event_name = 'Final Exam' AND description LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM notification_subscribers WHERE subscriber_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = 101 AND notification_id IN (SELECT id FROM notifications WHERE message LIKE '%important%');
DELETE FROM student_courses WHERE course_id = 5 AND student_id = 10;
DELETE FROM student_courses WHERE course_id = 3 AND student_id = 5;
